name: Freelance Nature Photographer 2072
description:
(Failed) entry of 7DRL 2019.

Controls: WASD to move around. C to open your camera, P to open your phone.

Premise: Wander around and take photos of animals. Once you take eight photos you should pack them up to get picked up (using your phone). You'll get paid for them in a day or two. Once you get paid you can order my supplies (currently just an extra memory card).

This is unfinished! I make no claims about the balance or anything. It's just a concept and won't be perfect and might even be horribly unbalanced. Also there's no way to "win" or "lose" so it's not really a complete game in any sense. Sorry!

Oh I also only tested it in Chrome because I'm terrible. Sorry if it doesn't work in your browser of choice!
